did.abstract: Letter sent form George G. Brown, Secretary of the Brooklyn Department of Public Instruction, to John L. Rider, Supervisor of Flatlands, regarding the Brooklyn Board of Education allotting $342.00 to the the trustees of Flatlands School District No. 2. The letter is dated July 10, 1895.
